data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during MEDWAY cruise from Spithead to St. Augustine started at 1760-04-28

Ship: Medway (4th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Spithead - St. Augustine, Madagascar, 1st Observer: John Bladen Tinker (Captain), 2nd Observer: John Jackson (1st Officer/Master), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 60G 1191BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
